name: SaveMyPC
description:
:

Simple shooter, eliminate the virus before it eats up your memory. Pretty challenging the play.

Details :

Game made in UE4

Textures made in Paint.NET

Models made in Blender

Premade assets :

Fonts taken from [www.1001freefonts.com]

Sounds taken from LittleRobotSoundFactory pack [freesound.org]

BGM taken from [https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/]
